title: Discovering the Rommel Murder The Life and Death of the Desert F
description:
Field Marshal Erwin Rommel's heroic opposition to Hitler
in 1944 cost him his life. In this intriguing, well-paced
tale of a journalistic coup, Marshall, the first to discover
the real events behind Rommel's death, tells how he learned
the facts from Rommel's widow and delves into the great
general's background and death. He arrived at his conclusions
based on his intimate knowledge of men on Rommel's staff and
his access to Rommel's papers, including letters from the
general to his wife. Here, for the first time in paperback,
is the exciting story of how the world learned about the
way the "Desert Fox" met his death

Discovering the Rommel Murder
By: Charles F. Marshall
ISBN13: 9780811724722
Format: EPUB
Language: EN
Pages: 602
